text: (suayib nabiva api apage dutaya vasayen yævu avasthavedi) ohuge janatavagen unagu vu pradhanin (ohuta) “o suayib!oba apage dharmayata nohærunahot niyata vasayenma api obavada, oba samaga vu visvasavantayinvada, apage ratin elava damannemu” yayi pavæsuha. eyata ohu, (ovunta “obage dharmaya) api pilikul kala vuvada?”yi vimasuveya
